name: WebGL2RenderingContext.compressedTexSubImage3D
description: The WebGL2RenderingContext.compressedTexSubImage3D() method of the WebGL API specifies a three-dimensional sub-rectangle for a texture image in a compressed format.

refs.name: WebGL 2.0
refs.description: The definition of 'compressedTexSubImage3D' in the 'WebGL 2.0' specification.

refs.name: OpenGL ES 3.0
refs.description: The definition of 'glCompressedTexSubImage3D' in the 'OpenGL ES 3.0' specification.
